pr_title: Make default JNLP container resource requests overridable

timeline.bodyText: I do not think settings limits is wise. In the case of CPU, this will prevent anything running in the agent container from using more than 10% CPU, arbitrarily slowing down legitimate operations. In the case of memory, this will cause the agent to crash if the JVM happens to use more than 256Mi.
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: Fair enough. I'll remove the limits.
replies.author: mbarbero
